Backblaze is an excellent choice for cloud backup, and their unlimited data backup plan is a great value.

**You're All Set for a Solid Backup Strategy!**

By combining your 1TB external hard drive for local backups and Backblaze for cloud backup, you'll have a robust backup strategy in place. This will give you peace of mind knowing that your files are safely stored in two separate locations, protecting you against data loss due to various threats.

**Tips for Setting Up Your Backup Routine:**

1. **Set a regular backup schedule**: Configure your external hard drive to backup your files at a frequency that works for you, such as daily or weekly.
2. **Use the 3-2-1 rule**: Ensure you have three copies of your files, two different storage types, and one offsite copy (your cloud backup).
3. **Test your backups**: Periodically test your backups to ensure they're completing successfully and your files are recoverable.
4. **Store your external hard drive safely**: Keep your external hard drive in a safe location, away from physical damage, water, and extreme temperatures.
5. **Monitor your cloud backup**: Regularly check your Backblaze account to ensure your files are backing up correctly and you're not experiencing any issues.

**You've Got This!**

By following these tips, you'll be well on your way to a robust backup strategy. Remember, backup is not a one-time task; it's an ongoing process to ensure your files are always protected.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, enjoy your peace of mind knowing your files are safely backed up!
